column5: SDRL The West Capricorn just lost its contract The West Auriga has had their dayrate suspended for over a 30 day period BP has unofficially said they will not renew the West Auriga contract The West Vela has pretty much the same contract Their contract will be treated in a similar way BP is hiring Diamond drillships So if BP is their money maker and those 3 rigs have the highest dayrates by a very large margin it would be hard to describe this company as anything but a dumpster fire
